casebody.data:
ONEWEST BANK, FSB
v.
Douglas V. GNAZZO, Trustee FOR the ANTONIO GNAZZO TRUST Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2017 Douglas V. Gnazzo, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 38755) is granted, limited to the following question:

"Can a sole trustee and sole beneficiary of an inter vivos trust represent 'his or her own cause' pursuant to General Statutes § 51-88 (d) (2) ?"
